name: End of You
description:
**Play in fullscreen for proper resolution**

This is a minimalist adventure game, so I'd encourage you to explore and experiment to try to figure things out on your own, but if you feel stuck there will be a small cheat sheet at the bottom of the description explaining some of the mechanics.

Controls:

- Arrow keys to move

- C to attack

- X to pick up or drop the light orb

Mechanics:

- The goal is to cleanse the 3 crystals to get to the ending

- You can't attack while holding the orb

- You can only cleanse shadowy objects by standing in the light from your orb

- Standing in the light of the orb heals you over time

- You deal significantly more damage to enemies while standing in the light

Dark Ambiance BGM was done by Philippe Groarke, found on opengameart.org

https://opengameart.org/content/dark-ambiance
